original_text: An animal that is good for food might die. A man might touch its dead body. If he does, they must keep him separate from the people until the evening.
korean_text: 너희가 먹을 만한 짐승이 죽은 때에 그 주검을 만지는 자는 저녁까지 부정할 것이며

sentences.original_text: An animal that is good for food might die
sentences.korean_translation: 음식으로 좋은 동물이 죽을 수 있다

sentences.original_text: A man might touch its dead body
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이 그 죽은 시체를 만질 수 있다

sentences.original_text: they must keep him separate from the people
